amendment.description: To extend loan limits for programs of the government-sponsored enterprises, the Federal Housing Administration, and the Veterans Affairs Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 857 proposed by Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 738.
Amendment SA 857 under the order of 10/20/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 38. Record Vote Number: 180.
